message.body: @mosen@zid: 在我的网站找到data/users/content.json，复制第10行以后的内容到你网站的相同文件夹，重新sigh，然后publish.
@mosen@zid: 管理员应该没有权限删除其他用户的留言，可能是没有同步到网络，你再编辑一下试试。
@yilmazerkan@zv: 我参考你的聊天室搭建了一个新的  http://127.0.0.1:43110/chat.mydf.bit/  请多多指教！
@erkan@zid: How can I delete someone's post from My Chatroom? e.g.  @gjwzye@zid:  I'd try edit  \data\users\12V5BTGFEYTWsK7X3YwQowPvoyM83Txmib\data.json，but it also display in the timeline.
@erkan@zid: I found his data/users folder and  delete，but his posts  still in the timeline    http://127.0.0.1:43110/chat.mydf.bit/
@erkan@zid: as a admin of thc chatroom ，I can
Understand , I can block him，but I can't delete a post from his history.
